name: TUA-160
description: This test case verifies that a 'Керівник' cannot add a location to the list of locations after leaving all mandatory and optional fields empty
descriptionHtml: This test case verifies that a 'Керівник' cannot add a location to the list of locations after leaving all mandatory and optional fields empty

testStage.description: This test case verifies that a 'Керівник' cannot add a location to the list of locations after leaving all mandatory and optional fields empty

steps.name: Authorize user with valid email admin@gmail.com and password admin
Click on dropdown for authorized user in top right corner of header
Checking that 'Додати локацію' pop-up is opened
